sect1.title: Commandline tab
sect1.para:
Looks command editor is settings in options dialog on tab "commandline". To execute options dialog click to menu on Tools/Options. Or type to command editor options(). Or click to options icon in toolbars.
Commandline tab

sect2.title: Show return value of executed script in console
sect2.para: If this setting is checked, command console will print return value of last command after executing it. It has basically the same effect as if last command was a parameter of function print().

sect2.title: Show return value also for complex type
sect2.para: This will toggle showin the return value for complex types, such as arrays, which are likely to produce lot of output, as arrays tend to be large.

sect2.title: Show errors from event handlers
sect2.para: This specify if you want to see error from callback handlers. If there is error in callback handler that is called very often, like handler for current item in tree being changes, it can produce lot out output.

sect2.title: Show command editor
sect2.para:
This option set command editor shown, if is check.
